title: Beautiful quiet 2-br home
posting_body: This totally remodeled, beautiful 2 bedroom home in a duplex is in a desirable, quiet and safe neighborhood in Shoreline.

It is near Seattle's city limits, in an excellent location with easy access to I-5 as well as within walking distance to several bus lines (buses 347 , 348, 65, 73 to Downtown, Northgate Transit Center, Aurora Village and some more).
It is close to shopping and to beautiful parks.
After entry through the front door of the house, an entry hall leads to the living room.
There is a beautiful kitchen with all-new appliances including a dishwasher, a new bathroom, a living room, and 2 bedrooms, a laundry area with a washer and a dryer.
The living areas have hardwood floors.
The property has a large, very private fenced yard.
There is a large patio right in front of the house entry.
Credit background check on all occupants (minimum 740 credit score required).
No yard maintenance fees or responsibilities.
1st month rent, last month rent, $750 security deposit.
